docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Lisa Burke, 15 years old, and Molly Tolkoff, 14, of Brookline, Mass., play a rough and tough, competitive brand of ice hockey for the Brookline High School freshman team. Rough play is not unusual for this sport. What is unusual is that their teammates are boys. In two years, however, the girls won't be on the varsity team.
